tha-ap412:10.2: aṭṭhaṅgāpi ca pupphitā → aṭṭhaṅgā ca supupphitā (bj) | hatthapātā ca pupphitā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kaṭṭhaṅgā ca supupphitā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap412:12.3: Dibbagandhaṃ → dibbagandhā (bj) | dibbā gandhā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap412:13.1: Asokapiṇḍivārī ca → asokapiṇḍī ca varī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | asokapiṇḍī ca vārī (pts-vp-pli1ed)
